name: Curried Salmon with Summer Fruit Chutney
author: MICHELLE0011
summary: The coolness of the fruit tastes great with the spicy salmon.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix the curry paste and lime juice together in a small baking dish
Add the salmon to the curry mixture and turn to coat evenly
Cover the dish with plastic wrap and place in refrigerator for 1 hour
While the salmon is marinating, make the chutney by stirring together the nectarine, plums, blueberries, onion, cayenne pepper, cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper in a bowl
Place chutney in refrigerator until salmon is ready
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Remove plastic wrap from salmon and bake in the preheated oven until salmon flakes easily with a fork, 12 to 15 minutes
Spoon chutney in even amounts over each fillet
